alert.note: Alert for Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 2:50AM CDT until September 24 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Polk County in western Arkansas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 249 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Big Cedar to 9 miles west of Hatfield to 19 miles west of Grannis to 9 miles northwest of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mena... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Hartley... Cossatot River State Park... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Cove... Acorn... Rocky... Black Fork Mountain Wilderness... Camp Pioneer... Rich Mountain... Hatton... Potter... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
